Title: Increases the amount of income property owners may earn for the purpose of eligibility for the property tax exemption for persons over sixty-five years of age
Summary: Increases the amount of income property owners may earn for the purpose of eligibility for the property tax exemption for persons over sixty-five years of age; increases such amount to $75,000.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to increasing the amount of income property owners may earn for the purpose of eligibility for the property tax exemption for persons sixty-five years of age or over
